name: getScreenSchemes
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of screen schemes.

Only screen schemes used in classic projects are returned.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

id.description: The list of screen scheme IDs. To include multiple IDs, provide an ampersand-separated list. For example, `id=10000&id=10001`.

expand.description: Use [expand](#expansion) include additional information in the response. This parameter accepts `issueTypeScreenSchemes` that, for each screen schemes, returns information about the issue type screen scheme the screen scheme is assigned to.

queryString.description: String used to perform a case-insensitive partial match with screen scheme name.

orderBy.description:
[Order](#ordering) the results by a field:

 *  `id` Sorts by screen scheme ID.
 *  `name` Sorts by screen scheme name.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
